snippet: Tom Kite set a United States Golf Association Open championship scoring record with a seven-under-par 28 on Thursday, but his 65 left him shy of the exalted air of the 59.
abstract: Tom Kite sets a United States Golf Association Open championship scoring record with a seven-under-par 28 on the front nine in the first round of the United States Senior Open.
lead_paragraph: Tom Kite set a United States Golf Association Open championship scoring record with a seven-under-par 28 on Thursday, but his 65 left him shy of the exalted air of the 59.

headline.seo: At U.S. Senior Open, Kite Shoots Record 28 on Front 9
headline.main: At U.S. Senior Open, a Record Front Nine, but Not a Perfect Game
headline.print_headline: At U.S. Senior Open, a Record Front Nine, but Not a Perfect Game
